video.title: USANA's Compensation Plan
video.shortdescription: An exciting way to learning the Compensation Plan.
video.longdescription: Learn all of the exciting details about the Binary Compensation Plan from USANA Associate Jeremy Stansfield. Have all of your questions answered with this step-by-step instructional video. Find out how your USANA business can reach its highest potential.

video.title: Matching Bonus Countdown
video.shortdescription: The Matching Bonus Countdown Has Begun
video.longdescription: Hit the ground running and achieve success even faster. You only have six weeks, or 42 days, from signing your USANA Associate agreement to take advantage of the PaceSetter and Platinum PaceSetter program. Set the pace now for a successful USANA business

video.title: Recession-Proof Formula
video.longdescription: Learn from Robert G. Allen, one of today's most influential financial advisors and author of the bestseller Multiple Streams of Income, how to create financial stability and build true wealth through his proven M.O.N.E.Y.T.R.E.E. formula.

video.title: USANA Comp Plan Benefits
video.shortdescription: 10 Benefits of the USANA Compensation Plan
video.longdescription: USANA's unique binary compensation plan has helped people all over the world achieve financial success. Learn how this award-winning business model can help you succeed with a powerful combination of features to maximize your business.

video.title: USANA's True Wealth
video.shortdescription: Take control of your future with USANA
video.longdescription: Learn how you can earn the money you deserve and have the freedom to enjoy it. Hear directly from just a few of the thousands of people who have experienced success with USANA's world-class products and innovative compensation plan.
